constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACKSON LEE:
H.R. 116.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clauses 1, 3, and 18 of
the United States Constitution.
[Page H54]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, and Global Human Rights.

title: Equal Rights and Access for the Women of South Sudan Act
